About.welcome_title: Welcome to The Night Before The Battle Interactive Scavenger Hunt!
About.about_title: About The Night Before the Battle Puzzle
About.restart_text: Are you want to start over? All progress will be lost.
About.ending_text: Congratulations! You found a letter home from Sergeant Poule. Some mysteries, however, remain unsolved. Perhaps they will reveal more of Poule's story.
